U.S. Defense Secretary's Reckless Remarks Flayed 
    Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Reunification Solidarity in south Korea reportedly issued a statement on July 8 denouncing U.S. Defense Secretary Rumsfeld. 
 Recalling that in a talk with a U.S. radio on July 5 he malignantly slandered the DPRK, vociferating about the necessity to develop nukes capable of penetrating underground, the commentary observed that this brought to light the United States' intention to step up the development of nukes.    
 The artifice employed by the U.S. to justify its war of aggression and development of nuclear weapons while talking about "freedom", "peace" and "democracy" can no longer work, it said, holding that if the U.S. persists in the development of nukes in that way, it is impossible to settle any issue through dialogue.

articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Sudanese President
    Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Omar Hassan Ahmed Al�|Bashir on the formation of a national united government in Sudan and his assumption of office as Sudanese president.
 The message said that the formation of the government in Sudan is a historic success made by the Sudanese people in the struggle to achieve unity and territorial integrity in Sudan and build a new prosperous society.    
 Expressing the belief that the relations between the two friendly countries would continue to grow stronger in the future, the message wished him great success in his responsible work for the unity of the country and the building of a new society.

articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Jilin Provincial People's Government in China.
 The gift was handed to Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, by Tian Xueren, vice-governor of the Jilin Provincial People's Government who is leading an economic and trade delegation of Jilin Province on a visit to the DPRK, on Thursday.
